summary: Elizabeth C. Feeley was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). The documents available are payroll and certification reports that list her name, salary, and employment dates. She appears in payroll certifications for April 1978, August 1978, and December 1978. These documents provide administrative details about her employment with the committee.
significance: Elizabeth C. Feeley's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations. While the specific nature of her role is not detailed in these documents, her presence on the payroll indicates she contributed to the committee's work.
